rule: The output must start with the label "Company names:" followed by a list of company names extracted from the input text in a comma-separated format.
input: Apple and Google are leading companies in technology.
coverage:
Company names: Apple, Google  
People names:   
Specific topics: technology  
General themes: business, innovation, technology
validityText:
The input is a string that contains a passage of text. The input string includes names of companies, specifically "Apple" and "Google", which satisfies the specification of including names of companies. The content is relevant as it pertains to technology, which is a specific topic or general theme relevant to the content. There are no violations of the input specification as the input string matches all specified conditions.

OK
